name: Charcoal Plaid
description: Beautiful charcoal, blue, and red plaid. Made of luxurious super-soft wool/cashmere blend. Fabric is imported from England. Bow tie is hand made in Los Angeles. Clip-on closure.

name: Burgundy and Gold Horsebit
description: Beautiful burgundy Italian wool bow tie with gold horsebits. Bow tie is hand made in Los Angeles of vintage Italian wool. Limited edition. Clip on closure.

name: Burgundy Vintage Gucci
description: This beautiful one of a kind burgundy silk bow tie is made of vintage Gucci silk. Fabric imported from Italy, bow tie hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Vintage Navy Stipe
description: Beautiful vintage silk twill burgundy and navy stripe bow tie. Exquisitely classic and preppy. One of a kind in our collection. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Vintage Pheasant Silk Bow Tie
description: This beautiful one of a kind bow tie is made from vintage Salvator Ferragamo silk. The pheasant pattern is printed over red and maroon leaves. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Vintage Green and Red Gucci
description: One of a kind green and maroon bow tie made from vintage Gucci silk. Bow tie is hand made in Los Angeles of imported italian silk. Clip on closure.

name: Green Wool Herringbone
description: Beautiful olive green wool herringbone bow tie. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure. 100% wool.

name: Multi Plaid Silk
description: Beautiful dark brown, navy, hunter green, and deep red plaid silk bow tie. Made from Façonnable silk. One of a kind. Hand made in Los Angeles of imported silk. Clip on closure.

name: Green Horsebit
description: This hunter green clip-on Boutaugh bow tie is made from a vintage silk Gucci neck tie. The repetitive horsebit and red-orange rope pattern is set on a hunter green background. One of a kind Boutaugh bow.

name: Vintage Geometric
description: Beautiful repetitive geometric blue and green pattern. One of a kind bow tie made out of vintage silk. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Éperon d'Or
description: This one of a kind Boutaugh bow tie was made from an exquisite vintage Hermès "Éperon d'Or" scarf designed by Henry d'Origny circa 1974. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Navy Polkadot
description: Beautiful classic navy bow tie with white polkadots. Hand made in Los Angeles from vintage silk.  Clip on closure.

name: Burgundy Cashmere
description: Warm up your winter look with this luxurious solid burgundy 100% woven cashmere bow tie. Bow tie is hand made in Los Angeles. Clip-on closure.

name: Brown & Tan Houndstooth
description: Vintage Ralph Lauren silk houndstooth bow tie. Hand made in Los Angeles. Clip on closure.

name: Garnet
description: Deep red. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Amethyst
description: A slightly muted dark purple. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Ore
description:
Ore is the color of raw earthy gold infused with vintage mossy green.  One of the favorites over here at Boutaugh, it is making its debut just in time to accent your Autumn wardrobe as the changing of the leaves reaches its peak. 

Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Tourmaline
description: Dusty mauve. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Ruby
description: Bright red. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Ocean
description: Rich teal. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Sapphire
description: Dark sapphire blue. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Cobalt
description: Intense blue. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Slate
description: Soft grey-blue. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: The Chris Tie
description: This bow tie is made of moss green silk velvet with royal blue piping to detail the knot.

name: Emerald
description: Dark emerald green. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Moss
description: Earthy moss green. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Olive
description: Silvery grey-green. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: The W Tie
description: Introducing the W Tie.  Perfect for any black tie affair, the W Tie is an Onyx black silk velvet bow tie with white piping accenting the knot. Pre-tied.  (Approximately 4.25" x 2.75")

name: Onyx
description: Black. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Seal
description: High shimmer, silvery grey. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Andradite
description: Dark brown. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Boutaugh Bespoke
description: Do you need a bow tie to match something precisely? Looking for the perfect size or shape? Or event a certain type of fabric?  We will work with you to customize a bow tie just for you. An heirloom scarf or the trimmings off a bridesmaid dress, we can make it into a bow tie. Prices will vary, so please contact us for more details.

name: Boy's Velvet
description: Little boy's silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure. Can be made in any of the adult colors.

name: Boys Blue & Green Stripe
description: Vintage Silk Navy and Green diagonal stripe for little boys. Clip on closure. For the future Ivy Leaguers.

name: Peacock
description: Vintage designer silk bow tie.  Clip-on closure.  Limited edition bow tie made from vintage Liberty of London silk.

name: Peridot
description: Sunny yellow-green. Plush silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Little Oscar
description: Black, white, and bright green little boy's clip-on bow tie made from Oscar de la Renta silk.

name: Summer Brights
description:
This Spring and Summer we are going BRIGHT! 

Plush silk velvet pre-tied bow ties.  New colors in Peridot, Cobalt, Fire Opal, and Indicolite. 

Peridot - sunny yellow-green. 
Cobalt - intense blue.
Fire Opal - striking orange.
Indicolite - a soft teal.

name: Boys' Vintage Bow Tie
description: Vintage designer Italian silk clip on bow tie for little boys.  This navy, red, and yellow horse tack pattern is perfect for any preppy little man.

name: Bougainvillea
description: Bright fuchsia. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Boy's Plaid
description: Navy, green, and white picnic basket plaid clip-on bow tie for little boys. Made from Carolina Herrera silk twill.

name: Boys Red & Navy Polkadot
description: A little boy's size red silk twill bow tie with navy polkadots. Clip on closure.

name: Brunch
description:
Perfect for a chic outdoor Summer brunch, these bow ties were made from an amazing vintage designer silk scarf. Pre-tied, clip-on closure. Limited edition. 

Weekend in the Hamptons anyone?

name: Jeweled Coral Cufflinks
description:
Vintage gold-tone coral cufflinks with a smoke colored jewel-cut glass. 

Approximately 1-inch.

name: Rose Purple
description: Soft rose amethyst with dramatic shadowing. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Tiger's Eye
description: A caramel medium brown. Silk velvet bow tie. Clip-on closure.

name: Green Agate Cufflinks
description:
Vintage polished green agate cufflinks.

3/4"x1/2"
